Text: RE AZ state pipeline highway mapsPhoenix District Permits Office is Dave Zimbro W Hilton Ave Phoenix fx I agree our map was probably used for the base map Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Thursday September PM To Bruce Vana Subject RE AZ state pipeline highway maps I have a copy of Phoenix area map On the bottom is a box that says Base map used by the authority of copyright license through the courtesy of Arizona State Highway Department Could this just be a highway map that someone later added pipelines too Do you have a phone contact name for the Phoenix Maricopa ADOT district office thanks for your help Original Message From Bruce Vana mailto Sent Thursday September PM To Hyatt Kevin Subject FW AZ state pipeline highway maps The only records ADOT will keep to this regard is for the permit each company receives for each facility crossing state right of way This info can be obtained from each district permits office For any state wide mapping we suggest you contact the owner El Paso Natural Gas etc directly Original Message From ADOT Internet Information Sent Thursday September AM To Bruce Vana Subject FW AZ state pipeline highway maps Original Message From Ray Perkins Sent Thursday September AM To ADOT Internet Information Subject RE AZ state pipeline highway maps It appears that is email is intended for the manager of Utilities and Railroad Section This position is currently managed by Bruce Vana Reading the note on this email I am not to forward this mail only reply Original Message From ADOT Internet Information Sent Thursday September AM To Ray Perkins Subject FW AZ state pipeline highway maps Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom mailtomailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Wednesday September PM To mailto Subject AZ state pipeline highway maps Im looking for an AZ state map that has natural gas pipeline information relative to state federal highway systems I would especially like to see something for Maricopa County Is this type of info available online If not who would I contact to get a printed copy thanks for your help Kevin Hyatt This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at mailto and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
